channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ilhan Omar says Trump attacks on Somali immigrants 'deflect attention' from scrutiny
item.description: NPR's Michel Martin speaks with Rep. Ilhan Omar, D-Minn., who came to the U.S. from Somalia, about President Trump's tirade against Somali immigrants.

item.title: This High Arctic rhino may change what we know about ancient animal migrations
item.description: A 23-million-year-old rhinoceros fossil is reshaping scientists' understanding of mammal evolution.

item.description: Yasser Abu Shabab, a Bedouin man in his 30s, was at the center of an Israeli project in Gaza to build up anti-Hamas militias.

item.title: Inside RFK Jr.’s Methodical Quest to Shake Up America’s Vaccine System
item.description: The health secretary has walled himself off from government scientists and empowered fellow activists to pursue his vaccine agenda.
